Accommodation Rendezvous Hotel Singapore + Night Safari Tour with Dinner (4 stars) Situated right in the heart of the Arts and Heritage District in a buzzing enclave surrounded near museums, national monuments and endless recreational activities at Bras Basah including 3 MRT stations within walking distance of the hotel. The Rendezvous Hotel is rich with history and contemporary features including a unique art installation and modern, well-appointed guest rooms. Night Safari Tour with Dinner - Uncover the tropical jungle after dusk and observe nocturnal animals in their natural habitat. Step aboard the tram and allow the walking trail to get you up close and personal with some animals. Witness the Thumbuakar fire-twirling performance or a 20-minute animal extravaganza at the creatures of the night show. An enjoyable dinner is included at Ulu Ulu Safari Restaurant.
